name: file_operations
description: Essential file operations for fast reads/edits of programming files and PDFs with minimal token usage

path.description: File or directory path for the operation; PDF files are supported for read operations

content.description: Content to write (for write) or replacement content (for edit)

pattern.description: Search pattern or regex (for search operation)

options.description: Line range for read_lines/edit operations (e.g., '10-20') or JSON options for list/search operations
